column5: Just got my test results in. The Colon is free and clear. The cancer got out of the Prostate and the Catscan shows lesions on my tail bone. It can be slowed down and/or stopped with Hormone shots  over a period of time. So all in all, its good news for me.  I want to thank everyone who sent good thoughts and wishes,and the PM's and e - mails to me. Believe me, they made a big difference to my attitude, and helped me in a BIG way to get thro' the last 6-7 weeks. THANKS AGAIN !!  Nanook  My only worry now is, if the hormones make me grow 'Boobs' will I be safe at Lakair!

That's good news.  Thanks for keeping us posted.  Best wishes for overcoming the remaining hurdles.  My brother took the same hormones and he quit just in time.   He still grows a beard.  Your great attitude is a strength for you.
That's great news Jack!!!  Maureen
Thanks Jack, good to hear things are looking up for you.  See you in  June
Really great news Jack!!!   I knew you whip that ol' crap!!!   If you were a little younger, you might look kinda cute with a set of Moobs!
What a nice Valentine's Day for you!!!! Super news
That's really great news Jack.    We all knew you could beat it. Now go catch some fish !!!!!
Great news Jack! Don`t worry about the boobs, seems to me someone attends that has manziers?
Great news Jack,was wondering how things were going.They make camo bikinis for your moobs if needed. Joe
Great news Jack and I am pleased that everything is going in the right direction. Hard to keep a good man down.  Best regards, Sam
Great news!  I'm very happy for you and your family.  Just got other great news...a friend of our familiy just got thru treatment for prostate cancer and all seems great with him as well.
great news, thanks for sharing it with us.
That is great news Jack...and do you think you were ever really safe at Lakair?
Congrats, went through testicular 18 years ago .  Its good to have support which usually comes from where you least expect it. Good luck
Great news Jack. Take care of yourself and stay on the doctors for regular checkups and keep it in check.
YAHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!  I'm glad you don't have to go through the chemo route and lose the rest of your hair...
That's fantastic new Jack!!!  If you need to, I'll lend you one of my bras, no worries  Joey
Awesome news Jack!!!!!! Thanks for the update.  Sincerely, 1leg
That's FANTASTIC news Jack! Hope to see you in June.   I think I'll be starting hormone treatments this afternoon Joey.
That's great news Jack!!!  As far as the boobs at lakair goes, just keep your distance from Roy and do not wear any red tops...
Absolutely fantastic news!!!!!!!
Fantastic news , I hope your prayers have been answered
